definition: The smell of earth after rain.
The realization that everyone has a complex life as vivid as your own.
Denoting a period of time in the past that was idyllically happy and peaceful.
The act of throwing someone or something out of a window.
An excessive desire to stay in bed.
A person who buys and sells books, especially rare ones.
Lasting for a very short time.
A cloud-walker; someone who lives in the clouds of their own imagination.
Something reused or altered but still bearing visible traces of its earlier form.
The state of being infatuated with another person.
A person or thing that is the center of attention or admiration.
